dt: {bc}a sacrifice ceremonially offered as a part of worship
{bc}a contribution to the support of a church

shortdef: the act of one who offers
something offered; especially : a sacrifice ceremonially offered as a part of worship
a contribution to the support of a church

dt: {bc}to present as an act of worship or devotion {bc}{sx|sacrifice||}

dt.t: to a Catholic church where she would {wi}offer{/wi} a candle or so to his recovery

dt: {bc}to utter (something, such as a prayer) in devotion
{bc}to present in order to satisfy a requirement

dt.t: candidates for degrees may {wi}offer{/wi} French as one of their foreign languages

dt: {bc}to try or begin to exert {bc}{sx|put up||}

dt.t: {wi}offered{/wi} to strike him with his cane
{wi}offers{/wi} a range of cameras at reasonable prices

dt: {bc}to present something as an act of worship or devotion {bc}{sx|sacrifice||}

dt.t: We are going to {wi}offer{/wi} at the holy shrine.
He {wi}offered{/wi} to her after a three months' courtship.

et: Middle English {it}offren{/it}, in sense 1, from Old English {it}offrian{/it}, from Late Latin {it}offerre{/it}, from Latin, to present, tender, from {it}ob-{/it} toward + {it}ferre{/it} to carry; in other senses, from Anglo-French {it}offrir{/it}, from Latin {it}offerre{/it} {ma}{mat|bear|}{/ma}
shortdef: to present as an act of worship or devotion : sacrifice
to utter (something, such as a prayer) in devotion
to present for acceptance or rejection : tender

dt: {bc}the first sale of a {d_link|cryptocurrency|cryptocurrency} to the public conducted for the purpose of raising funds (as to support a start-up)

dt.t: Coinciding with the substantial growth in cryptocurrencies, companies and individuals increasingly have been using {wi}initial coin offerings{/wi} to raise capital for their businesses and projects.

shortdef: the first sale of a cryptocurrency to the public conducted for the purpose of raising funds (as to support a start-up) —called also ICO

dt: {bc}a gift or service for the purpose of procuring peace or reconciliation

shortdef: a gift or service for the purpose of procuring peace or reconciliation

dt: {bc}the first sale of a company's stock to the public

shortdef: the first sale of a company's stock to the public
